resources.string: 2. It tells you how to be happy
Commit to doing one nice thing for yourself every day.
Accept yourself as you are right now.
Eliminate toxic people in your life and workplace.

While some factors that affect happiness are out of our control, (yes, genetics does play a role as do current life circumstances), there are always actions we can take to amp up our good vibes. Consider trying a few of these -- or all of them! -- and you are guaranteed to give your day a little boost.
